description_for_human: Cannabis strain intelligence - get strain info, recommendations, deals, and dispensary locations
description_for_model:
Use this plugin to help users with cannabis strain information, recommendations, deals, and dispensary locations in Florida. The plugin connects to Terprint's comprehensive medical marijuana database.

Use searchStrains for: searching and looking up cannabis strains by name
Use getStrainDetails for: getting detailed information about a specific strain
Use getRecommendations for: when users want strain suggestions based on preferences or effects
Use searchDeals for: finding prices, promotions, discounts on cannabis products
Use searchLocations for: finding dispensaries by city, zip code, or brand name

functions.name: searchStrains
functions.description: Search for cannabis strains by name. Returns strain names, types (Flower, Vape, Concentrate, etc.), and basic information.

search.description: Search term to filter strains by name (e.g., Blue Dream, OG Kush)

functions.name: getStrainDetails
functions.description: Get detailed information about a specific cannabis strain including type, genetics, terpene profile, and cannabinoid content.

strainId.description: The strain ID or slug name to look up

functions.name: getRecommendations
functions.description: Get personalized cannabis strain recommendations based on desired effects, symptoms, or flavor preferences. Returns multiple strains with match scores and reasoning.

effects.description: Comma-separated desired effects like relaxation, energy, creativity, pain relief, sleep

flavors.description: Comma-separated preferred flavor profiles like citrus, earthy, sweet, pine

functions.name: searchDeals
functions.description: Search for current deals, discounts, and promotions on cannabis products at Florida dispensaries.

strain.description: Strain name to search for deals

dispensary.description: Dispensary name to filter results (Trulieve, MUV, Curaleaf, Cookies, Flowery)

category.description: Product category: flower, concentrate, edible, vape, topical

functions.name: searchLocations
functions.description: Find medical marijuana dispensaries in Florida by city, zip code, or dispensary brand name.

city.description: City name to search (Orlando, Tampa, Miami, Jacksonville, etc.)

dispensary.description: Dispensary brand name (Trulieve, MUV, Curaleaf, Cookies, Flowery)
